name: Juice Expressive Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Florals..Scent Type: Fruity Florals..Key Notes: Strawberry, Raspberry Pulp, Rhubarb..Fragrance Description: Commodityu2019s newest fragrance will make your mouth water just thinking about it. Perfectly ripe strawberry, rhubarb, and raspberry pulp are blended until smooth with a base of amberwood...About the Bottle: The Expressive Collection is presented in Commodity's balanced black and white. The starting point for Scent Space, the Expressive fragrance names have no signs or symbols...About the Fragrance: I really wanted to redefine what a juicy scent is. Juice Expressive centers around succulent, vibrant fruits, but the ingredients I paired them with are what make this scent unique. It's an explosive, colorful, unconventional twist on the juicy, fruity fragrance profile. u00adu2013Nathalie Benareau..Clean.Our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificingu00a0effectiveness.
ingredients: SD-Alcohol 40-B (Alcohol Denat.), Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spritz one to two times directly on the pulse points, such as your wrists, inner elbows, or sides of the neck. .-Pulse points are warmer areas of the body that act as natural diffusers when emitting a scent..-After application, allow the scent to air dry. .-Rubbing or dabbing will break down a fragrance and cause it to wear off more quickly..-If you wear fragrance on the wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing..-Properly store your bottle to extend its shelf life, including recapping after each use and avoiding direct sunlight...Recycling Instructions:.-While Commodity works toward fully recyclable packaging, the majority of your fragrance can currently be recycled. .-The box, paper notecard, and pulp tray should be recycled as paper. .-The glass bottle and metal pump should be recycled as glass. .-The cellophane and bottle cap should be thrown in the trash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has such a fresh and bright scent, perfect for summer in my opinion. I donu2019t get berries or rhubarb here at all, but instead a really strong grapefruit with maybe a subtle jasmine undertone - still amazing! This one reminds me of the Dior Addict perfume with the same floral grapefruit notes. I think it smells a little different for everyone though.

reviews.review_title: Nice fruity floral wish it was more fruit heavy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: it's starts of as nice and jammy juice fruity you can definitely pick up the raspberry and strawberry notes. The dry down is more roses than I would prefer, but it's still a got perfume. I would recommend if you like fruity floral but not if your looking for something purely fruity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell but... it's sooo small. For over 100$ it's tiny! I'd reccommened the scent but the size for the price is absurd.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely divine. So juicy and definitely expressive. I can't stop smelling this and it lasts a long time. To make it last longer, make sure you're moisturized and spray it on your pulse points and  behind your knees, but don't rub it in, let it air dry. Rubbing it in drastically shortens its potency. My husband loves it on me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a mini version in a ufffcand I absolutely love the scent ufffcu2764ufe0f i will definitely buy more. Itu2019s such an addicting fragrance that i love smelling it on myself lol. A must try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this scent as one of the freebies in my first sample bag ever! It smells sweet, seductive, sophisticated, and definitely wearable. I love that the scent is long lasting! Plus I got a compliment from my boyfriend. So when you go out on a date, this would be a good choice to catch his attention!u263aufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If anyone remembers the beautiful scent of the original Christian Dior,  Miss Dior Cherie, this is the closest thing to it, was so sad when was discontinued but if this is the closest to it that I found on the market; I also do a  lot of research :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought by the description this would be a sweet syrupy scent like burberry her. I was pleased that it was not! The berries come through in the beginning, then you get the sharpness of the rhubarb, followed by a soft cashmere skin musk. Very nice.

reviews.review_title: very different on paper vs skin, 7/10
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this on IPSY, when I first sprayed this on paper I was SO disappointed. I actually hated it. All I got was roses and I'm really not a fan of floral notes at all. On the skin though this pulls very different. I've had it on a couple hours and it's starting to grow on me.  The initial blast of rose discipates pretty fast and leaves a meddly of juicy berries with a hint of greenery. I don't get any specific strawberry or raspberry notes unfortunately but it is a very bright, femine and flirty fragrance! I wouldn't wear it all the time as I much more prefer gourmands but this would be amazing in the spring and summer. If you're like me and you hate it on paper, give it a chance on the skin and see if you feel differently! Not my favorite, but definitely worth the try. Solid 7/10.

reviews.review_title: This scent gives.. Sexy, Grown and Fruity!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the type of perfume youu2019d want to wear if you want to smell juicy, rich and classy! Has great staying power as well. Will stay on your clothes and skin all day.. Will purchase again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Misleading name as there is no fruit scent in this fragrance at all. Itu2019s a department store basic scent, nothing special. Commodity missed the mark with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, forget the name. I smell zero fruit. It smells like a really fancy department store fragrance section. Straight Neiman Marcus, zero produce section.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this in-store and bought the travel spray to give it a try. After reading its comparison to Nest Lychee Rose, I kind of started to dislike it. Rose wasn't apparent to me at first, but now it's all I can smell in the middle-notes. It's kind of a generic smell but refined enough to be a quality fragrance. I don't find it lasts very long considering, which is disappointing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone whose signature scent has been Kayali's juicy apple since it's release, I literally jumped when I found a new fruity, juicy, scent in the market. However, this perfume has been so deceitful that it feels wrong to even advertise it as something fruity. Absolutely, no raspberry, no strawberry, it just smells like an axe cologne, way too masculine with no sweet fruity notes whatsoever.

reviews.review_title: Should have named it Generic rose.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a little salty about this purchase. If you want to smell like a generic cheap perfume or a mall this is the perfume for you. At least that's what my body chemistry makes it smell like. I personally don't get the Juiciness that this launch hyped up. I get straight rose. no fruit and definitely no juice. It has the same underlying smell of every Victoria Secret perfume. If you're not a fan of rose, don't waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually went to Sephora looking for a new perfume to try as my YSL Mon Paris finished and saw this in display. I love commodity the milk expressive and velvet are my faves. I tried this one and it smells so good. It does smell exactly like the name itu2019ll have you smelling like some fresh fruit. I ended up not buying at the store but  I had to come back on the website and get it lol. How it smells on you really depends on your body physics not all scents are made for your skin and not everyoneu2019s skin is the same. So if it smells bad on you thatu2019s not the perfumes fault.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First scent is a Raspberry and strawberry with a slight pink pepper fizz (although itu2019s not pink pepper. The cyclamen which has a pepper quality to it. This note remains subtle throughout.)  After 5 minutes, thereu2019s something fresh, most likely rhubarb. A sweet green with a little tang. Rhubarb can be tricky for me; I don't always like it, but here I do.  15 min: something tart but light. Thereu2019s raspberry cherry in the background. Iu2019m not sure how this projects. Itu2019s about arms length. The amber wood begins to surface. Itu2019s woody, not heavy or dull but slightly resinous (but NOT incense or smokey). The fragrance is becoming sweet, almost powdery (is this the cyclamen?).  1 hour: fruit notes are hanging in there~ not like candy. Just a pulpy ripe fruit blend, a raspberry with depth. Thereu2019s a little powderiness. Definitely sweeter and more leaning toward a resinous amber wood. Still a little peppery.  3-4 hours: still fruity, a little freshness and warm, resinous fruit. And the raspberry is hanging in there! That light peppery quality is there, too, along with a warm base of amber wood. From here on, the fragrance remains basically the same.  5 hours and thereu2019s still raspberry! More of a skin scent now. The smell lasts on my wrists for at least 6 hours.   I really like this! For a fruit, the staying power is of the raspberry is amazing. Usually fruit burns off quickly. I think raspberry, in general, is a fruit with longevity. Iu2019ve noticed this in Wavechild. But Wavechild is like candy. This is a raspberry with depth and a little tang. This is a well-blended fragrance in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm going to be the unpopular minority and say that Juice expressive smells like powdery Smuckers jam on me =/  I even tested and spritzed some on my arm and while I enjoyed the freshness of the topnote the drydown of the one I purchased makes me smell like a department store perfume lady who oversprayed every fruity fragrance throughout her workday and now smells like the amalgamation of every single saccharine fruit note imaginable at once.  Never had a fruity perfume give me a headache before  until commodity Juice expressive came along

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a go to spring/summer scent. Tested today in store. Donu2019t care for the other perfumes under this brand but Juice is GOOOOOD. Torn between this one and bold. Bold is heavier on the nose. Canu2019t wait for my samples to come to layer and play with them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this was a blind buy because I love raspberry! Commodity hit this one on the head.  I know it smells different on everyone, for me a get a sweet tart raspberry and then once it dries down I just get fruity deliciousness but in a mature, sexy way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very beautiful scent for whatever reason the rose really sticks when I wear it but my mom on the other hand has more of the fruity side of the the fragrance ( which I thought was really cool) it smells different on my clothes though it leans more fruity . I think Hold expressive is my all time fave still though :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very let down. not fruity at all for me. donu2019t smell any of the listed notes. smells very artificial and more floral than fruity in my opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent because itu2019s fruity but has depth too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this was a blind buy for me! I smell the rhubarb most, and other than that it's a bit smoky & musky, similar to other commodity fragrances I own. it's a great summer scent for people like me who prefer more cologne like scents but want to brighten things up a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I blind bought this perfume because my store did not have the large one in stock for me to smell. NO MISTAKES WERE MADE! Commodity does not miss in making a fragrance that is wearable every day. Juice is fruity (but not overpowering), musky (in a delightful way), and flowery. The perfume also transforms over the first 10 minutes of application. At the beginning, it is a sweet scent, then moves more towards dark and dusky. I would say that everyone should smell the perfume before they buy it, but I am glad not to regret my decision!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing smell very unique smell would most definitely recommend to others , not to pungent but present

LOVE Commodity... but this was a huuuuge disappointment for me. more floral then fruity, more tart/sour then sweet. smells like a cheap body spray. very, musky, fresh, but maybe a little too, fruity floral laundry detergent, potpourri covering up musty B O vibes. only lasted maybe an hour on my skin. definitely fruity, but i wouldn't call this sweet.

reviews.review_title: This is the LaCroix of perfume Where is the Fruit?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was expecting fruity goodness, but all I'm getting is masculine/androgynous notes and amber wood. This does not smell anything like fruit, strawberry or even raspberry. It smells like a perfume.  I wouldn't recommend a blind buy, and I was so excited for this launch but I'm highly dissatisfied. I had my friend smell it, and she said it reminded her of her mother. So take that how you will.  This does not smell anything like juice, or even the essence of juice.  If you are a sweet fruity girly, this is not the perfume for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is sweet and lasts for hours on my skin! The only reason I ended up returning it was because I have a perfume that has a very similar scent profile. I think itu2019s a great fragrance to transition from late summer into early fall!

reviews.review_buyer_description: notSure skin tone
reviews.review_text: smells like $1 suave strawberry shampoo x 100. good scent if you like that vibe

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Starts out very juicy and fruity but the dry down became way to floral for me. It became an overpowering rose scent, however, I am sensitive to floral scents and that may be why the dry down is so unappealing to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i really wanted to love this. the notes sounded dreamy. itu2019s just fine tbh. smells pretty cheap, like a body spray or target mixbar fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super masculine. Did not like. It smells like cologne. All I get is the woody notes and none of the fruity notes. Maybe a little bit of green rhubarb, but god it's not a good scent. Made me nauseous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells good, it was just too strong for me - first time I tried it on my skin, it almost instantly gave me a headache, 15 mins later I was already scrubbing it off my skin. I acknowledge the scent is good, it was just too strong for my personal tatare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells nostalgic. Tart and sweet at first but once it melts into the skin, you smell the amber wood notes and warmth come through. Lasts for several hours without needing to spray again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this as soon as it dropped, because a juicy, fruity fragrance is exactly what I wanted. But this fragrance is just an absolute rose bomb for me. Sour rose. From first spray until it fades away (about 4 hours for me). However, my husband smells that tart, fruitiness that I wanted, and no rose. And after reading others reviews, there are vastly different experiences. So, I wouldn't recommend a blind buy. I don't typically like rose, but I don't hate this. I will wear it, mixing with other things, but not repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Good Girl Blush Dupe on the dry down
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfume smells goodu2026 however to me it smells exactly like good girl blush by Carolina Herrera. That is the only reason I am giving it 3 stars.  Itu2019s slightly less sharp but pretty much the same scent.  Kinda berry, kinda lychee (2

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I blind bought this as well as the scent space from Commodityu2019s site just to be sure and I really love it. My skin amps amber in any perfume that has it so the amber wood makes it smell quite warm and inviting but in a way that makes it appropriate in any season on me. The raspberry and strawberry arenu2019t too juicy on me, itu2019s more of a grown kind of juicy instead of a younger body spray kind of juicy - I assume thatu2019s the cyclamen and rose rounding it out. It isnu2019t that sickly sweet candy kjnd of juicy to me.   What really surprised me was how different it smells spritzed on clothes - I can distinctly smell the raspberry and rhubarb and it had more of a fresh, ripe fruit smell thatu2019s light and airy - I can barely smell the amberwood with it all, so a unique sensory experience. My scent space kit also had Juice- (the personal space one) and that is much more floral on me in comparison to this one. Both very much worth a try and I will be keeping the full size!

reviews.review_title: Not Juicey At All, All Amber Wood
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I get none of the berry top notes that are supposed to be key to the u201cjuiceu201d scent. It is vaguely sweet. I get a little of the rose in the middle. But, oh boy, the amber wood dry down is STRONG. And it is not pleasant on me. It last and lasts for hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so good but the lasting power is pretty short! almost as short as a body spray. I wish it lasted longer :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is fruitier than Iu2019d hoped, but if youu2019re into berries and fruity scents then this is definitely for you!! I am a huge fan of Commodity fragrances. Theyu2019re great quality, long lasting and layer great with each other. I have several of their others including Milk, Gold and.  Paper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this reminds me SO much of Nestu2019s Lychee Rose fragrance. they smell almost identical. itu2019s a nice scent, not sure if itu2019s my vibe though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This one is what I hoped for. It is  full of berry-ness! More raspberry than strawberry on me. This is very spot on w/the notes listed. Sweet and a little tart, w/a warm base. I smell zero powder or floralu2026 Idk how anyone is smelling that with the u201cexpressive space scentu201d version. I have been a Commodity fan for ages, I own many of their fragrances. This is their first new scent in years, since they were sold and relaunched with the scent spaces.  I would recommend sampling before purchasing so you can know what u201cspaceu201d you like the best, as there are different notes in each one. Perhaps thatu2019s why some of the reviews are noticing other elements than I am? The expressive is the middle tier of the 3 and itu2019s perfect for me, and this is the only one I have tried. It doesnu2019t announce me to a room, but if someoneu2019s close by me it is likely to be noticed. The longevity is impressive, and a little goes a very long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Commodity makes some of my favourite scents and this one is no exception. Itu2019s literally the most perfect juicy warm and seductive scent I cannot get enough. Layers well with lychee fragrances and cherry ones. I am truly obsessed with

reviews.review_title: Dreadful, burn the house down instead.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Zero stars. This was easily the worst blind buy of my lifetime. The scent is so strong gross it sticks to the back of your throat. Itu2019s giving Buckleys cough medicine. Itu2019s a heck no.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So this definitely isnu2019t very u201cjuicyu201d it smells very similar to Angel Nova by Mugler. In the opening it smells kind of synthetic and is slightly tart in the dry down. I donu2019t get any of the strawberry, just tartness and florals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Commodity's Juice Expressive scent, and I absolutely love it. The fragrance is vibrant and fresh, with a perfect balance of fruity and floral notes. It has a long-lasting effect without being overpowering. It's quickly become my go-to scent for both day and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t like this perfume at all. This perfume is very sweet and tart but not in a good way. It smells a lot like angel nova by mugler. I regret buying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Juicy as described! Full bottle worthy! I said it once and Iu2019ll say it again: itu2019s Juicy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do not get any juice in this perfume. Very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product online as a blind buy, after reading all of the great reviews about how it smells like strawberry juice. After I tried it out, I was very disappointed. It smells just like baby powder to me. The smell is not horrible, I was just expecting a fruity juice smell. Try it before you buy it!
Although it doesnu2019t smell original, itu2019s still really nice. Itu2019s really close to Angel nova.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have tried all Commodity perfumes, and I was excited to try this. It opens pretty sour on me rather than juicy, then mellows into berries but still not sweet (which was great). The dry down is mostly rose, but it reads as a heavier fragrance. I wanted something summery, and this wasnu2019t it. I will wear it in cooler weather, and it is a pretty fragrance. Just not the one I was hoping to use this summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: at first spray it's so delightful, I read some reviews stating that it smelled mature, I don't believe so. I did a couple sprays and let me tell you it lasted possibly 8 hours or more! my son sprayed some sprays and it changes on him very versatile perfume. somehow it smells sweeter on me and it smells very masculine on him.

reviews.review_title: A bit of a let down
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shockingly disappointed by this one. The rose is too strong and too sharp for me. Itu2019s like a Strawberry version of Nest Lychee Rose: I find it to be a little too fresh, and it gives air freshener vibes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well ordered two bottles of this and one is going back very rosey to my nose reminiscent of Delina on the dry down and I didnu2019t like that . Not sweet to me at all but pretty fragrance for someone who loves rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s giving Mugler angel nova, it has the sharp florals. Was hoping for this to be fruitier but itu2019s really floral dominant. Projection is pretty good though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not think I would live this fragrance this much! I was worried it was going to be too sweet but itu2019s perfect. Very refreshing and has a slight sweet smell. Perfect for summer time! Might need to get the bigger bottle ud83dude2d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I really wanted to like this perfume but the floral completely outweighed the fruity notes. Also, it smells like something i could pick up at bath and body works. Not unique.

reviews.review_title: Dry down is straight rose! A no for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Commodity fan, but Juice Expressive does not work for me; it's too rosey. The initial spray is juicy and I do get strawberry, but the dry down is straight rose AND I AM NOT A FLORAL FRAGRANCE GAL.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was a huge let down. I love the other Commodity fragrances but this has to be their most generic, floral scent yet. When I sniff the bottle I get all the juiciness but as soon as I spray it I'm hit with florals and that's really it. It honestly smells very similar to those Marc Jacobs Daisy perfumes. Super

After using this perfume for the past couple of days I can safely say that I will be purchasing the full bottle once Iu2019m done with this bottle smells so good and expensive. You definitely need to try for yourself since scents smell different on everything but so worth it !!
I am not typically big on floral fragrances but I LOVE this one! Itu2019s not overbearing but still last for a great part of the day! The floral scent is refreshing, friendly and welcoming!

reviews.review_title: My New Favorite Perfume- Feminine Floral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the standout features of Commodity Juice is its longevity. It lingers on the skin throughout the day, without ever becoming overwhelming. The balance between freshness and longevity makes it ideal for both day and night.  I've received numerous compliments whenever I wear Commodity Juice. It leaves a lasting impression without dominating the room, making it a versatile choice for any occasion.   It has a feminine touch with a blend of freshness and floral hints. The perfect perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really hoping I would agree with these reviews, but this perfume is everything BUT a juicy and fruity fresh scent. It is so heavy and floral. Its the opposite of bright and uplifting. While I can appreciate that this fragrance seems tonbenvery well  done, its just way too mature for my liking

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a fun, juicy and complex fruity fragrance! I love how this scent is so dynamic and unique. The fruity notes balance perfectly with the subtle floral notes. I really enjoy this fragrance, perfect for the summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping this perfume would fulfill all of my juicy summer perfume dreams, but sadly itu2019s fallen short. It smells like a more floral u201cMarc Jacobs Daisyu201d to me. Itu2019s niceu2026 but not at this price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This sweet and fruity fragrance is an absolute delight for my senses. The notes of raspberry and strawberry create a juicy and refreshing aroma that instantly uplifts my mood. The hint of amber wood adds a warm and comforting depth to the scent, making it perfect for any occasion. I find myself reaching for this fragrance time and time again, as it lingers beautifully on my skin. If you're a fan of sweet and fruity fragrances like me, this scent is a must-try. It's a harmonious blend of fruity sweetness and woody warmth that truly leaves a lasting impression.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very particular about my fragrances.. this one nailed it for me! The scent is so refreshing and clean with a hint of juicy fruit - perfect for summer! reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are a fan of fruity fragrances with a tart edge, this one is for you. Itu2019s more sophisticated than many fruity fragrances Iu2019ve tried; I donu2019t want to smell like a bath & body store, and this has a really lovely balanced undertone to it that lingers for a long while. I feel that it could be gender-neutral also - itu2019s complex enough to work for many people. It's a great summer fragrance and I see myself reaching for it a lot.

reviews.review_title: This is your next summer scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Juicy strawberries, tart rhubarb, and comforting musks. I think this is going to be your next favorite fruity summer scent. Commodity really doesn't miss with their releases and this one is no exception. The opening is a bright tart juicy fruity scent with a sweet strawberry heart and rose. The dry down is warm, musky, and creamy. I can't stop sniffing my wrist with this one! The fruity notes last a good 3-4 hours on me and the sweet and musky drydown has been hanging around for hours more! I highly recommend you try this out if you are looking for a new summer scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm absolutely in love with this fragrance. It's like a burst of summer in a bottle - its a juicy, rose-infused scent that's perfect for warmer months but also transitions beautifully into colder weather. I'm a sucker for gourmand florals, and this one hits all the right notes for me. What I really appreciate is that it's not overwhelming like some rose scents can be. Instead, it's bright and refreshing, like roses carried on a crisp breeze, with just the right amount of fruity sweetness. The way the rhubarb adds a tartness that mixes so seamlessly with the strawberry and raspberry notes is just delicious, like the perfect balance of a fruity preserve. Commodity has knocked it out of the park with this one. It's a solid 10/10 in my book!

I love fruity, sweet scents and this is the one I like so much. It's strong, sweet, fruity with a hint of strawberry and then changes to some sweet floral scent. It's a perfect scent for summer. Talking bout longevity I found it to be perfect. For me it lasted about 6-8 hours and that's absolutefragrance. I love the scent and would highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a good fruity fragrance thatu2019s great for everyday! Super juicy and I love the added rhubarb. I just wish it lasted on my skin longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a fresh, fruity scent that's both invigorating and long-lasting. The fragrance strikes a perfect balance between sweet and sophisticated, making it suitable for any occasion. Plus, the sleek bottle design is a nice touch. Overall, it's a fantastic choice for anyone looking for a vibrant, everyday perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent! It's sweet citrus forward in the opening and dries down as a fruity floral. It has moderate projection and leaves a beautiful scent trail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is absolutely amazing. Itu2019s a great summer scent. It smells fruit but it a sophisticated and feminine way. The smell reminds me of summer. I get complimented so much when I wear this perfume. It lasts me all day and I absolutely love it. This brand is a must have for fragrances.
Love the fruity essence it Iu2019ll be perfect for the summer to someone who likes fruity smell in love with this .
In love with this essence you Can feel the strawberries on this so perfect for this summer the fruity and fresh smell is everything

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a must have! I just recently started getting into new fragrances. So I love something different about each and every one of them.

reviews.review_title: adding this to my gourmand heavy collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: as someone who skips incentivized reviews, don't. this is a good one, LOL. i'm a huge fan of gourmands, so for commodity i really love milk and gold. i am typically a floral hater, i feel that the scents come off synthetic and cloying. however, without knowing the notes of juice at first, i tried this and immediately got fruit, floral, and even some type of sensual depth. as it settles, the floral becomes stronger. after an hour, you smell possibly iso E? skin musk? as well as the amberwood mentioned. i honestly really enjoyed it. fruit is really easy to do wrong, it can be childish and this scent is the exact opposite. i actually can't believe i'm giving a floral 5 stars, but well done commodity.

reviews.review_title: must have it on my purse
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product and have used it for three days. I'm absolutely in love with the scent it's great. The package is very small and unique, making it easy to fit into my purse and carry around with me. The perfume's scent is very feminine and soft, with strong floral notes and a hint of woodiness after it dries down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Both as a raspberry lover and a perfume collector I was incredibly excited to try Juice and let me tell you this scent did not disappoint! Itu2019s fruity, fresh and makes a statement. I already know Iu2019ll be wearing this all summer long. I also would like to note that the longevity was impressive. In my experience a lot of fresh scents donu2019t have enough power to last through the day, but this one did. 10 out of 10 would recommend!

reviews.review_title: This is going into my everyday scents for sure!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m absolutely obsessed with this perfume and now need to get it in full size!! Itu2019s the most beautiful scent for every single person! Itu2019s fruity, but in a very sexy, sophisticated way, it has the undertone of spice to it that its mouth watering!!! This is for sure a fragrance that will have people stopping you on the street for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is a well balanced blend of sweet strawberry, tart rhubarb, and light woods and a hint of green-ness. This isn't an over-sugared kool-aid, imagine juicing the freshest fruits in your juicer - that's the vibe. The scent is super addictive and it lasts really well, especially for a fruity scent profile. It's fun and youthful but not in a candied way - really anyone could wear and enjoy this fragrance. LOVE IT!!

reviews.review_title: The only summer Juice you need
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Omg Commodity has me hooked. This Juice is THE juice of the summer! Iu2019ll definitely be keeping this in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance smells amazing! The initial spray is a little, but after it settles on my skin (wrist), I get the citrus, fruity dry down. I smell the strawberries more than the raspberry note.  The dry down and the base note is a little earthy, but itu2019s not overpowering. I still smell the fruitiness of it and I love it. I would layer this with a fruity body lotion or body butter to bring out more of the fruitiness, but this is definitely a summer, beachy fragrance . I really love it and Iu2019m probably going to purchase the large bottle.

reviews.review_title: This needs to be part of your perfume collection!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is such a great addition to the Commodity line! It's fresh with a hint of fruits, yet still has that fluffy marshmallow DNA that I love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Upon first spray you understand why itu2019s called Juice! The berry top notes and absolutely divine! It dries down to an earthly floral that still has a touch of sweetness to it. Itu2019s definitely a spring/summer fragrance. I can definitely see this being a go to perfume for outdoor events and festivals. If youu2019re a gourmand girl like me, I think this is still a good buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a sexy floral fragrance. Itu2019s not heavy on the rose and I really mean that because I do not like floral fragrances. This gives me kind of a reminiscence of Oriana. Itu2019s super seductive. I really enjoy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! Juice is a delightful sweet-tart fruity perfume with a vibrant blend of mouthwatering ripe strawberry, raspberry pulp, and tangy rhubarb. A hint of amberwood gives it a nice, warm, slightly woody undertone to balance out all that fruity deliciousness. Itu2019s lively, flirty, and vivacious without being cloying or too sweet. Juice is a happy, succulent, and unique scent with great lasting power and year-round versatility. Itu2019ll shine bright in the summer, and I can picture it brightening up dull winter days. Love it! I will definitely be purchasing a full bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells SO GOOD!! I cannot get over how much I loved this perfume from the first spray. Iu2019ve never tried Commodity perfumes before and this did not disappoint. It lasted a good amount of time on my skin and the projection was good. It reminded me a little bit of YSL Mon Paris Intensement. So in love with this fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Juice Expressive is hands down one of the best fruity fragrances I have ever come across. It is a true fruity dream that will transport you to a fruit filled paradise with just one whiff. The blend of juicy fruits in this scent is absolutely divine, leaving you feeling refreshed and invigorated.  What sets Juice Expressive apart from other fruity fragrances is that it is not juvenile in any way. It has a sophisticated and sultry undertone that makes it the perfect sexy summer scent. The combination of fruits and sensual notes creates a harmonious balance that is both irresistible and alluring.  I am instantly transported to a sun-soaked beach with a cocktail in hand. The scent is so mouth-watering and delicious that it is impossible not to fall in love with it. It is the perfect fragrance for those hot summer days when you want to feel sexy and confident.  Overall, Juice Expressive is a must-have fragrance for anyone who loves fruity scents. It is a unique and captivating scent that will leave you feeling like a fruity goddess. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a fresh and sexy summer scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I typically don't go for fruity scents, but Juice took me by surprise! Not only is it fruity, but it is also floral, which I enjoy, since the fruitiness isn't overpowering. Such a fun, light scent for the summer season! Also has great longevity, perfect for a nice day out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ive used this the last three days and definitely could still smell it at the end of the day its a very long lasting but gentle scent. I absolutely love it and think it would pair nicely with the paper scent!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried a few of Commodityu2019s scents and this new launch is my favorite! I love fruity notes in my fragrances but they typically end up leaning a bit juvenile and this one doesnu2019t at all, itu2019s elevated and classy. On initial spray I get those strawberry and raspberry pulp notes, itu2019s juicy and bright. Then as it settles into my skin more that rhubarb becomes more present which really adds some depth to the fragrance and then once it dries down thereu2019s also a woody scent Iu2019m picking up on. I know Iu2019ll be reaching for this a lot in the spring and summer months because itu2019s not cloying and performs well in high heat but I think this could be worn year round and it also had great longevity for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance definitely took me by surprise. I thought it was going to be super fruity but as soon as I sprayed it, I was shocked. Itu2019s the perfect amount of fruitiness and some wood. It also reminded me of another fragrance I had in my collection (hibiscus mahajad). Overall, love love. This is not only a summer fragrance, I think itu2019s perfect for all seasons.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance! Itu2019s not too sweet. I layered Juice with Paper. The combination of these two fragrances compliments each other. This is a Summer Must Have! Donu2019t walk! Run ud83cudfc3u200du2640ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product I have received positive feedback! I love the authenticity of this unique scent and plan on continuing to use this product for my u2018signature scent!u2019 The packaging is high quality and reliable which I value with this brand too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is a pleasant surprise. Iu2019m not the best with describing notes but itu2019s a juicy, raspberry that I smell. Itu2019s not overbearing at all because I do not particularly go for fruity scents but itu2019s sparkling and light. A fresh smelling punch if you will. I wore this to work today and got a ton of compliments.  One of my staff told me that I smelled delicious! If you like fruit but in a clean aesthetic way, this is it! I will be buying a full sized version of this and maybe later it with Milk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This scent really is juicy! I absolutely love the amberwood base and the fruity notes like raspberry pulp and strawberry. The Rhubarb note surprised me but I don't mind it. It lingers and has a beautiful aroma of luxury. The scent radiates from the wrist and I have fallen in love with it. I have never smelled anything similar to it before so that makes this scent even more unique. I would recommend wearing this on a date because it is sexy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is genuinely my new favorite perfume. The scent last all day I didnu2019t have to reapply it. Itu2019s a nice fruity smell, but itu2019s not too overpowering in that sense. this is amazing. Everybody needs to try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent arrived just in time for Summer! Commodity's Juice Perfume reminds me of biting into a perfectly fresh and juicy fruit! This scent is sweet, fruity, and floral. Itu2019s a bright and energetic scent. The notes of strawberry, raspberry, and rhubarb are noticeably present. Itu2019s a sweet treat for the senses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent so much! It is my new go to perfume for daily use as well! Iu2019m definitely loving this scent!

When I first heard about this launch, I was very excited, but I was also unsure how well juicy/fruity perfume goes with Commodity. However, the first time I sprayed it, I felt that it is such a perfect match to their line. This perfume is fruity floral, it is light, but projects well. Itu2019s very inoffensive and I think a lot of people would love it. I smelled it without knowing the notes, so for me it smelled like pink peppers and red currant in the opening. As it started drying down, it smelled sweet and berry like, but gentle and not overpowering. Looking at the notes, I can see how rhubarb can smell like red currants, but I donu2019t particularly smell strawberries or raspberries - just berries in general. Itu2019s a beautiful scent and I can see myself reaching for it all year round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so pleasantly surprised by this one! Itu2019s so fun to see this amongst the collection of fragrances that commodity already has. Itu2019s fun, fruity, and such a good one for summer. The strawberry and raspberry notes are followed by a musky dry-down that balances out the sweetness. Itu2019s not too cloying, and can be worn on multiple occasions. The name is perfect, itu2019s a mouth-watering experience. I love that this feels so fun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first heard the name of this fragrance I thought Iu2019d get something like a fruit punch but boy was I WRONG! This smells incredible, i definitely get the strawberry when i first spray it but itu2019s not bad at all. Then when it starts to settle it smells amazing such a fruity floral scent. Give it a few to settle in. Get a good 6 hours and then I no longer smell it on me but given that itu2019s a fruity floral 6 hours is really decent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is something else, I havenu2019t tried anything like it. Is floral but somehow smoky, I donu2019t know to explain it but even my husband loves it.
